about_the_game:
About This Game


It is a mix of a classic RPG and CCG. In the game, instead of cards with different abilities, you define the actions of the characters by rolling dice with various effects on its faces.

But don't worry, you're still in control of the battlefield! With your unique abilities and customizable items, you can manage the element of randomness and modify the final effects of the roll.

Collectible Dice Game


Cube de Grace is CDG. It’s like CCG but with dice instead of cards. This adds an extra layer of fun and excitement to the game. The random aspect can still be managed with the help of skills, items, and other mechanics.

Win battles and explore the galaxy to upgrade your collection. Add heroes and items to the mix and find your own way to control your fate.

RPG Elements


The tabletop role-playing game spirit, combat mechanics with dice and RPG elements, such as dialogues, non-combat encounters. All this is merged with the fun of CCG style.

The Best Combat Mechanics


◉ Plenty of heroes, idols for your character, with their own abilities and characteristics. You determine your set of heroes that best fit your style.

◉ Collecting dice with various effects on their sides and abilities that affect during the turn.

◉ A turn-based duel with in-battle progression and tons of dice rolls.

◉ Items that allow you to change the properties of dice right during the battle. Or sacrifice them (dice) for the sake of beneficial effects.

Customizable Settings


The consistency and predictable randomness of Dicey Dungeons, but with a more mature setting and non-combat encounters.

Diversified Gameplay


The game cycle with drastically different gameplay.

Gather the party of heroes with different characteristics. Bring the most valuable items with you. Roll dice to fight. Use abilities to change the result of the battle at will. Get a collection of dice, heroes, and items and go further and further on your way to change the destiny of your loved ones.

Unique Story


All armed conflicts are in the past since scientists discovered the way to determine people's fates. They have created the corporation responsible for distribution of dice, your elements of fate, for every newborn in the world. With the support of different races they quickly established a strong dictatorship over the galaxy and now they control the fates of one and all. Since then the only possible conflict resolution method is a match of Cube de Grace, the game of fates. The winner has full power over the fate of the loser.

What will you do if your family is lost in the sequence of strange events and you will be arrested for just one crime – ability to control the threads of destiny? Will you give up? Or you will try to change your fate no matter the cost?
